<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">  InlineAsmInfo = std::make&#95;unique&lt;SPIRVInlineAsmLowering&gt;(TLInfo);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">  Legalizer = std::make&#95;unique&lt;SPIRVLegalizerInfo&gt;(&#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">  RegBankInfo = std::make&#95;unique&lt;SPIRVRegisterBankInfo&gt;();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">  InstSelector.reset(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa6df07ec16d5dbc78057a9bb49361bdd">createSPIRVInstructionSelector</a>(TM, &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, &#42;RegBankInfo.get()));</Highlight></CodeLine>
